title: Cospender Split group expenses
summary: BEST APP to manage your group expenses and split bill with friends.
description: Cospender is an indispensable and easiest app to manage group expenses and bill split and IOUs with your partner, friends, roommates or family.Create groups of expenses: Home, Holidays, trips, vacations, citytrips, ski, holidays, meals, gifts...Invite a member to join and share your group expenses.Cospender split bill and calculates the debt of each member to settle up with your friend.Features:- Automatic sync (synchronization)- Debt calculation of each member to settle up- Offline expense creation- Recurring expenses- Pie chart of expenses- Android Wear compatibleCospender is the most advanced tools to: split bill, share event expenses, settle debts, who owes who, Split Money, split the bill, create a tricount or splitwise and calculate what everyone needs like a tricount, splitwise, iou.Like traveling, a city trip, a road trip, a hike, a tricount, Cospender is for you.
descriptionHTML:
Cospender is an indispensable and easiest app to manage group expenses and bill split and IOUs with your partner, friends, roommates or family.

Create groups of expenses: Home, Holidays, trips, vacations, citytrips, ski, holidays, meals, gifts...
Invite a member to join and share your group expenses.
Cospender split bill and calculates the debt of each member to settle up with your friend.

Features:

- Automatic sync (synchronization)
- Debt calculation of each member to settle up
- Offline expense creation
- Recurring expenses
- Pie chart of expenses
- Android Wear compatible

Cospender is the most advanced tools to: split bill, share event expenses, settle debts, who owes who, Split Money, split the bill, create a tricount or splitwise and calculate what everyone needs like a tricount, splitwise, iou.
Like traveling, a city trip, a road trip, a hike, a tricount, Cospender is for you.
comments: Unable to restore a/c After reinstall always show error: error in sync check your connection I am on high speed wi-fi

Excellent app and amazing service I now always suggest this app for shared expenses. The app is easy to use, flexible and helps to manage money when in a group. The customer service is really good too. I couldn't retrieve my account, wrote cospender a message on fb and within a day I had an answer with the steps to follow. Congratulations !
Great app, but it lack of the ability to have a different date of the entries rather than the current day :-(
Used during a trip in Thailand with a friend who used the iOS version, worked perfectly!
Really missing the chance to set a different date for the entries

Best app for a group spends calculations The app has all you need. You just need to explore it. This is a second app which I am rating 5* so just go for it if you need not to calculate your bills, dues and monthly spends.
recentChanges: We added the possibility to select the beneficiaries when it is created.
We also improved the UX and fixed some minor bugs.
